    • printStream

      public java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream printStream()
      Description copied from class: BaseListMenu
      Same as BaseMenu.printStream(), but outputs a different style of view. Most notably, the list items start at number 11, not 1.
      Overrides:
      printStream in class BaseListMenu
      Returns:
      A stream which can be converted to a string, this is what will be displayed on screen

    • postDraw

      public void postDraw​(boolean skipLine)
      Description copied from class: BaseMenu
      Once the menu has been drawn, then run this, normally to take the user's input as an int, but can be overridden to take strings as the input
      Overrides:
      postDraw in class BaseMenu
      Parameters:
      skipLine - Whether the system should skip a line once the page has been drawn.
